title: title
uploadtitle: Upload a PPT or PDF File
uploadLabel: Choose a file or drag it here
urlType: You can submit medium Link & blog Link etc
textdescription: Copy paste your script into the video script box alongwith a suitable title in the video title . Click Create Scenes to breakdown your script into video snippets.
uploaddescription: Directly convert a ppt or pdf file into a video by choosing the file and dragging it in the box.
urldescription: Copy paste the URL of an external blog post or newletter and change them into a video content
courseTabDesc: You can add subtitle to your videos
soundTabDesc: You can add Sound to your videos
previewNote: This is a low quality video for rendering purposes only, when your are ready, extract a high quality video by publishing it
previewAgainText: Do you want to generate the Preview again ?
beforeLibraryAlert: Add a video script and create scenes
processingWarning: Please don"t close this tab, transaction under processing.

processing.title: Create a Content ID
processing.description: Assign a unique identifier to your content. Write it on decentralized ledger.

processing.title: Publish on MarketPlace
processing.description: Publishing the asset on marketplace with your unique Decentralized ID (called a DID or DDO)

processing.title: Create link for Paid Access
processing.description: Creating access tokens for the published content, using which people will buy/fork your content.

processing.title: Permission to sell your content
processing.description: Note that we published content under your name with full rights to the content. Hence we need your permission to sell the access token on your behalf.

processing.title: Create Exchange Key
processing.description: Creating an exchange to sell the access token

failed.title: Failed to create data-token. Aborting creation

processing.title: Permission to exchange your OCEAN tokens
processing.description: We need your permission so that we can exchange your OCEAN tokens for the datatokens

processing.title: Swaping your token
processing.description: Calling smart contract to exchange the tokens

processing.title: Start download service and sign the transaction to start the download process
processing.description: Register your account to the download service and if already registered, sign using metamask to authenticate your account.
